00035 void QActive::run(void) {
00036     m_running = (uint8_t)1;                    // allow the thread-loop to run
00037     do {
00038         QEvent const *e = get_();                            // wait for event
00039         dispatch(e);          // dispatch to the active object's state machine
00040         QF::gc(e);      // check if the event is garbage, and collect it if so
00041 
00042     } while (m_running); // loop until m_running is cleared in QActive::stop()
00043 }
